00016   // Struct to hold custom function callback
00017   struct Sass_Function {
00018     const char*      signature;
00019     Sass_Function_Fn function;
00020     void*            cookie;
00021   };
00022 
00023   Sass_Function_List ADDCALL sass_make_function_list(size_t length)
00024   {
00025     return (Sass_Function_List) calloc(length + 1, sizeof(Sass_Function_Entry));
00026   }
00027 
00028   Sass_Function_Entry ADDCALL sass_make_function(const char* signature, Sass_Function_Fn function, void* cookie)
00029   {
00030     Sass_Function_Entry cb = (Sass_Function_Entry) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Function));
00031     if (cb == 0) return 0;
00032     cb->signature = signature;
00033     cb->function = function;
00034     cb->cookie = cookie;
00035     return cb;
00036   }

00040   void sass_function_set_list_entry(Sass_Function_List list, size_t pos, Sass_Function_Entry cb) { list[pos] = cb; }

00047   struct Sass_Import {
00048     char* path;
00049     char* base;

00051     char* srcmap;

00053     char* error;

00058   // Struct to hold importer callback
00059   struct Sass_Importer {
00060     Sass_Importer_Fn importer;
00061     double           priority;
00062     void*            cookie;
00063   };
00064 
00065   Sass_Importer_Entry ADDCALL sass_make_importer(Sass_Importer_Fn importer, double priority, void* cookie)
00066   {
00067     Sass_Importer_Entry cb = (Sass_Importer_Entry) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Importer));
00068     if (cb == 0) return 0;
00069     cb->importer = importer;
00070     cb->priority = priority;
00071     cb->cookie = cookie;
00072     return cb;
00073   }

00094   // Creator for sass custom importer return argument list
00095   Sass_Import_List ADDCALL sass_make_import_list(size_t length)
00096   {
00097     return (Sass_Import**) calloc(length + 1, sizeof(Sass_Import*));
00098   }
00099 
00100   // Creator for a single import entry returned by the custom importer inside the list
00101   // We take ownership of the memory for source and srcmap (freed when context is destroyd)
00102   Sass_Import_Entry ADDCALL sass_make_import(const char* path, const char* base, char* source, char* srcmap)
00103   {
00104     Sass_Import* v = (Sass_Import*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Import));
00105     if (v == 0) return 0;
00106     v->path = path ? sass_strdup(path) : 0;
00107     v->base = base ? sass_strdup(base) : 0;
00108     v->source = source;
00109     v->srcmap = srcmap;
00110     v->error = 0;
00111     v->line = -1;
00112     v->column = -1;
00113     return v;
00114   }
00115 
00116   // Older style, but somehow still valid - keep around or deprecate?
00117   Sass_Import_Entry ADDCALL sass_make_import_entry(const char* path, char* source, char* srcmap)
00118   {
00119     return sass_make_import(path, path, source, srcmap);
00120   }
00121 
00122   // Upgrade a normal import entry to throw an error (original path can be re-used by error reporting)
00123   Sass_Import_Entry ADDCALL sass_import_set_error(Sass_Import_Entry import, const char* error, size_t line, size_t col)
00124   {
00125     if (import == 0) return 0;
00126     if (import->error) free(import->error);
00127     import->error = error ? strdup(error) : 0;
00128     import->line = line ? line : -1;
00129     import->column = col ? col : -1;
00130     return import;
00131   }
00132 
00133   // Setters and getters for entries on the import list
00134   void ADDCALL sass_import_set_list_entry(Sass_Import_List list, size_t idx, Sass_Import_Entry entry) { list[idx] = entry; }
00135   Sass_Import_Entry ADDCALL sass_import_get_list_entry(Sass_Import_List list, size_t idx) { return list[idx]; }
00136 
00137   // Deallocator for the allocated memory
00138   void ADDCALL sass_delete_import_list(Sass_Import_List list)
00139   {
00140     Sass_Import_List it = list;
00141     if (list == 0) return;
00142     while(*list) {
00143       sass_delete_import(*list);
00144       ++list;
00145     }
00146     free(it);
00147   }
00148 
00149   // Just in case we have some stray import structs
00150   void ADDCALL sass_delete_import(Sass_Import_Entry import)
00151   {
00152     free(import->path);
00153     free(import->base);
00154     free(import->source);
00155     free(import->srcmap);
00156     free(import->error);
00157     free(import);
00158   }
00159

00162   const char* ADDCALL sass_import_get_base(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->base; }
00163   const char* ADDCALL sass_import_get_source(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->source; }
00164   const char* ADDCALL sass_import_get_srcmap(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->srcmap; }
00165 
00166   // Getter for import error entry
00167   size_t ADDCALL sass_import_get_error_line(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->line; }
00168   size_t ADDCALL sass_import_get_error_column(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->column; }
00169   const char* ADDCALL sass_import_get_error_message(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { return entry->error; }
00170 
00171   // Explicit functions to take ownership of the memory
00172   // Resets our own property since we do not know if it is still alive
00173   char* ADDCALL sass_import_take_source(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { char* ptr = entry->source; entry->source = 0; return ptr; }
00174   char* ADDCALL sass_import_take_srcmap(Sass_Import_Entry entry) { char* ptr = entry->srcmap; entry->srcmap = 0; return ptr; }
